io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Plugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Plugin

  • public class Plugin
extends java.lang.Object
    Plugins define how plugin effect are rendered. They can't be created directly, but existing plugins can be modified by changing their properties (also called plugin options).
